metadata.title: YMI Women's Junior Full Length Water Resistant Puffer Jacket
features: It is officially time to transition into fall/winter! Shop YMI Women's Juniors puffer jacket to find the perfect warm, slim-fitting jacket for your fall/winter outfits and busy days traveling. The women's puffer jacket features a detachable faux fur hood, a front zip closure, and two front zip closure pockets.

YMI's Women's puffer jacket with detachable hood is made with a 100 percent polyester exterior, interior, and puffer jacket fill. The puffer jacket for women features a sleeve inner lining with thumb holes and a faux fur inner lining for maximum warmth. The heavy-duty outer lining is made with water-resistant fabric to keep you warm and dry all fall/winter.

This heavy, warm puffer jacket for women is the hip length for a moderate fall/winter look with full coverage. The slim fit, windproof, water-resistant fabric locks in heat and keeps rain and snow out. The silky faux fur lining and heavy 100% polyester body, trim, and sleeve filling will keep you feeling warm, dry, and comfortable all fall/winter long.

The perfect puffer winter jacket for just about anything! This water-resistant, weatherproof jacket for women is great for travel or play. The zip closure pockets are great for stashing your cards and keys when traveling. The removable faux fur hood gives you the versatility of an essential water-resistant winter jacket or a stylish women's fall full coverage jacket.
Wash and Care: Machine wash cold with like colors, line dry for maximum durability.
description: Keep it cozy this winter in our Puffer Jacket With Detachable Faux Fur Hoodie. Featuring a top faux liner inside and a faux fur hood trim for extra softness and warmth. Designed with a water-resistant fabric to keep the rain and snow out. This jacket has a front zipper for closure. Also featuring zippered hand pockets and a detachable hood for convenience and ease. This jacket won’t just keep you warm and cozy, you’ll look stylish and cute too! Pair this with a long sleeve or turtle neck, some of our skinny jeans, and booties!
